title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: July 09, 2023, 01:53:39 PMLast edit: October 18, 2023, 10:05:48 AM by julerz12
content: [UPDATE] 7/12/23 Tho the team agrees to have me escrow the bounty pool (thus announcing it as having an escrow), the team still hasn't sent the tokens into my escrow address to this day.It seems the tokens were locked in the contract until July 17th. The team promises to escrow the bounty pool once the tokens are unlocked.Let's wait til then.[UPDATE] 7/17/23PEPEMO Team has sent an initial 1 trillion PEPEMO tokens to the escrow address. They plan on sending 1 trillion per 2 weeks until the bounty pool is fully escrowed. [ TXID ][UPDATE] 8/01/23PEPEMO Team has sent another 1 trillion PEPEMO tokens to the escrow address. [ TXID ][UPDATE] 8/17/23PEPEMO Team has sent another 1 trillion PEPEMO tokens to the escrow address. [ TXID ][UPDATE] 9/04/23PEPEMO Bounty Campaign will be extended for an additional 4-weeks. No additional bounty pool. Team's decision not mine.[UPDATE] 9/05/23PEPEMO Team has sent another 2 trillion PEPEMO tokens to the escrow address. [ TXID ]. The entire bounty pool is now in escrow.[UPDATE] 10/01/23 PEPEMO Bounty campaign has officially ended. The spreadsheet will be finalized as soon as all the stakes are added and all the content creation have been successfully checked and verified.Bounty rewards will happen once we have the final list.Signatures can now be removed/changed.[UPDATE] 10/18/23 PEPEMO Bounty campaign rewards have been sent: https://bscscan.com/tx/0x09daad12d81e723686a7dda64370588e6d6e73f74c96187581a4cb1968255f94Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign), invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO), or use their platform at your own risk.
